query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:DEPARTMENTS:X.ENTITY:CODE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:DEPARTMENTS:X.LAST_UPDATED_DATE:LAST_UPDATED_DATE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:DEPARTMENTS:X.LAST_UPDATED_BY:LAST_UPDATED_BY@ FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ent.entity, dep.last_updated_date, csu.user_name AS last_updated_by FROM entity ent JOIN departments dep ON dep.entity_id = ent.id LEFT JOIN cmn_sec_users csu ON csu.id = dep.last_updated_by WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT sq.entity, sq.last_updated_date FROM ( SELECT e.entity, MAX(d.last_updated_date) AS last_updated_date FROM entity e JOIN departments d ON d.entity_id = e.id GROUP BY e.entity ) sq WHERE sq.entity = ent.entity AND sq.last_updated_date = dep.last_updated_date ) ) x WHERE @FILTER@
